UNITED STATES
United States [Member]
Redeemable Noncontrolling Interests [Text Block]

Change in fair value of Redeemable noncontrolling interests relating to the ability of minority shareholders to require us to acquire their interests in entities in which we own less than 100%. The components of the change in fair value include changes in ownership percentage, net income or loss attributable to noncontrolling interests, dividends paid, effect of foreign currency translation attributable to noncontrolling interests and other changes in fair value of redeemable securities.
Redeemable Noncontrolling Interests
Healthcare Distribution [Member]

The health care distribution reportable segment aggregates the global dental, medical and animal health operating segments. This segment consists of consumable products, small equipment, laboratory products, large dental and medical equipments, equipment repair services, branded and generic pharmaceuticals, vaccines, surgical products, diagnostic tests, infection-control products and vitamins.
Health Care Distribution [Member]
Technology [Member]

The technology and value-added services group provides software, technology and other value-added services to healthcare practitioners. The technology group offerings include practice management software systems for dental and medical practitioners and animal health clinics. The value-added practice solutions include financial services, e-services and continuing education services for practitioners.
Technology and Value-Added Services [Member]
Dental [Member]
The global dental group is a subgroup of the health care distribution group that serves office-based dental practitioners, schools and other institutions.
Dental [Member]
Medical [Member]
The global medical group is a subgroup of the health care distribution group that serves office-based medical practitioners, surgical centers, other alternate-care settings, and other institutions.
Medical [Member]
Animal Health [Member]
The global animal health group is a subgroup of the health care distribution group that serves animal health practices and clinics.
Animal Health [Member]

U S Trade Accounts Receivable Securitization [Member]
U.S. trade accounts receivable securitization [Member]

A debt facility agreement with a bank, as agent, based on the securitization of our U.S. trade accounts receivable, which will provide funding for working capital and general corporate purposes. The financing is structured as an asset-backed securitization program.
Debt Pricing Committment Period
Pricing commitment period
Maximum number of years for which the pricing is committed under the asset-backed securitization program.
Committment Fee For Usage Upper Facility Limit
Commitment fee for facility usage - facility limit greater than or equal to fifty percent usage (as a percent)

Commitment fee under our asset-backed securitization program, in number of basis points, on the daily balance of the unused portion of the facility if usage is greater than or equal to 50% of the facility limit.
Committment Fee For Usage Lower Facility Limit
Commitment fee for facility usage - facility limit less than fifty percent usage (as a percent)
Commitment fee under our asset-backed securitization program, in number of basis points, on the daily balance of the unused portion of the facility if usage is less than to 50% of the facility limit.
Number Of Insurance Companies Providing Private Placement Facilities
The number of insurance companies that have provided the private placement facilities.
Number of insurance companies providing private placement facilities (in number of insurance companies)
Adjustments To Additional Paid In Capital Share based Compensation Other Longterm Incentive Plans Settled In Cash

Liability for cash settlement stock-based compensation awards
Average Asset Backed Commercial Paper Rate [Member]
Average rate for asset-backed commercial paper.
Average asset backed commercial paper rate [Member]
Maximum Average [Member]
Average upper limit of the provided range.
Payments For Restructuring And Restructuring Reserve Accrual Adjustment
The sum of cash payments made as the result of exit or disposal activities and the amount of any reversal and other adjustment made during the period to the amount of a previously accrued liability.
Payments and other adjustments
Employee Stock Option [Member]
Employee and director stock options [Member]

An arrangement whereby an employee or member of the Board of Directors is entitled to receive in the future, subject to vesting and other restrictions, a number of shares in the entity at a specified price, as defined in the agreement.
Debt Instrument Variable Rate Basis At Period End
The actual interest rate at period end for the reference rate used to compute the variable rate on the debt instrument.
Debt instrument, variable rate basis at period end
Other Comprehensive Income Loss Foreign Currency Transaction And Translation Adjustment Net Of Tax Excluding Portion Attributable To Redeemable Noncontrolling Interest
Foreign currency translation gain (loss) (excluding amounts attributable to Redeemable noncontrolling interests)

Amount after tax and reclassification adjustments of gain (loss) on foreign currency translation adjustments, foreign currency transactions designated and effective as economic hedges of a net investment in a foreign entity and intra-entity foreign currency transactions that are of a long-term-investment nature. Excludes the portion attributable to redeemable noncontrolling interest recognized as temporary equity.

Private placement facility additional borrowing capacity
Accumulated Other Comprehensive Income Loss Foreign Currency Translation Adjustment Attributable To Nonredeemable Noncontrolling Interests Net Of Tax

Accumulated adjustment attributable to nonredeemable noncontrolling interests, net of tax, that results from the process of translating subsidiary financial statements and foreign equity investments into the reporting currency from the functional currency of the reporting entity, net of reclassification of realized foreign currency translation gains (losses).
Foreign currency translation adjustment

Initial Noncontrolling Interests And Adjustments Related To Business Acquisitions
Increase (decrease) in equity resulting from the amounts paid to acquire initial noncontrolling interests, increase noncontrolling interests and other adjustments.

Effective Income Tax Rate Continuing Operations Without Effect Of Reduction Of Valuation Allowance

Percentage of current income tax expense (benefit) and deferred income tax expense (benefit) pertaining to continuing operations, calculated without the effect of the reduction of the valuation allowance.
Effective tax rate without effect of reduction in valuation allowance (in hundredths)
Changes In Fair Value Of Redeemable Securities

Change in fair value of redeemable securities
Change in fair value of redeemable securities
Restricted Stock And Restricted Stock Unit Awards [Member]
Restricted stock/units [Member]
Restricted stock and restricted stock units awarded by a company to their employees as a form of incentive compensation.
Performance Based Restricted Stock Restricted Units [Member]
Performance-based restricted stock/units [Member]
Restricted stock awards and restricted stock units that vest based on achieving specified performance measurements and the recipient's continued service over time.
Restructuring Charges Per Diluted Share

Amount of expenses per dliuted share associated with exit or disposal activities pursuant to an authorized plan. Excludes expenses related to a discontinued operation or an asset retirement obligation.
Restructuring costs, per diluted share
Restructuring And Related Cost Expected Cost Per Diluted Share
Amount expected to be recognized in earnings for the specified restructuring cost per diluted share.
Restructuring costs, expected costs per diluted share

Restructuring activities in fiscal 2012.
2012 Restructuring
Restructuring Plan 2015 [Member]
Restructuring activities in fiscal 2015.
2015 Restructuring
Restructuring And Related Cost Expected Percentage Of Workforce Eliminated
Expected percentage of workforce eliminated (in hundredths)
The expected percentage of the workforce to be eliminated as a result of restructuring activities.
Investments And Other [Abstract]
Redeemable Noncontrolling Interests Policy [Text Block]
Disclosure of accounting policy for redeemable noncontrolling interests describing our requirements to acquire additional ownership interests at fair value.
Redeemable Noncontrolling Interests
Impairment Or Disposal Of Long Lived Assets Including Definite Lived Assets Policy Text Block

Describes an entity's accounting policy for recognizing and measuring the impairment of long-lived assets. An entity also may disclose its accounting policy for long-lived assets to be sold. This policy excludes goodwill and indefinite lived intangible assets.
Long-Lived Assets
Intrinsic Values Of Stock Options Table Text Block

Disclosure regarding the total dollar difference between fair values of the underlying shares reserved for issuance and exercise prices pertaining to options under the plan as of the balance-sheet date.
Intrinsic values
Distribution Network Costs

Total distribution network costs included costs related to purchasing, receiving, inspections, warehousing, internal inventory transfers and other costs of the distribution network. These costs are included in selling, general and administrative expenses.
Total distribution network costs
Furniture Fixtures And Other [Member]

Equipment commonly used in offices and stores that have no permanent connection to the structure of a building or utilities. Also includes all other long term capitalized assets related to property plant and equipment not otherwise categorized.
Furniture, fixtures and other [Member]
Computer Equipment And Software [Member]

Long lived, depreciable assets including capitalized costs of purchased software applications and capitalized costs to develop software for internal use that are used in the creation, maintence and utilization of information systems.
Computer equipment and software [Member]
Goodwill Adjustment [Abstract]
Distribution Rights And Exclusivity Agreements Net Of Amortization
Legal rights, generally of a limited duration, to distribute a product, often within specific geographic areas or supply channels, net of amortization.
Distribution rights and exclusivity agreements, net of amortization
Business Combination Separately Recognized Transactions Loan Receivable Noncurrent

The loan receivable due after one year from the balance sheet date (or the normal operating cycle, whichever is longer), recorded in a transaction with an acquiree that is recognized separately from the acquisition of assets and assumptions of liabilities in a business combination.
Acquisition related loan receivable
Note Receivable Noncurrent Interest Rate Minimum
The lowest interest rate in the aggregated noncurrent notes receivables.
Minimum percentage of long-term notes receivable interest rates (in hundredths)
Note Receivable Noncurrent Interest Rate Maximum
The highest interest rate in the aggregated noncurrent notes receivables.
Maximum percentage of long-term notes receivable interest rates (in hundredths)
Note Receivable Maturity Date Range End
The latest maturity date for long-term notes receivable due in varying installments.
Latest maturity date of varying installments of long-term notes receivable
Other Assets Noncurrent Amortization
The expense charged in the period to amortize other long-term assets.
Amortization of other long-term assets
Business Combination Long Term Receivable Reclassified As Intercompany Loan

The loan receivable due after one year from the balance sheet date (or the normal operating cycle, whichever is longer), recorded in a transaction with an acquiree that is recognized separately from the acquisition of assets and assumptions of liabilities in a business combination. The loan was converted to an intercompany loan when the transaction closed and is eliminated in consolidation.
Loan provided prior to completion of the acquisition, converted to intercompany loan and eliminated in consolidation upon completion

Middle East equity affiliate [Member]
Operating Loss Carryforwards With Expiration Dates
Amount of operating loss carryforward, before tax effects, available to reduce future taxable income under enacted tax laws. The portion of total operating loss carryforwards with expiration dates.
Net operating loss carryforwards subject to amortization
Operating Loss Carryforwards Not Subject To Expiration
Amount attributable to deductible operating loss carryforwards that are not subject to expiration dates.
Net operating loss carryforwards not subject to expiration
Income Tax Reconciliation Interest Expense Related To Loans

The portion of the difference between total income tax expense (benefit) reported in the income statement for the period and the expected income tax expense (benefit) computed by applying the domestic federal statutory income tax rates to pretax income from continuing operations, that is attributable to interest expense related to loans.
Interest expense related to loans
Any Single Customer [Member]
Represents any single customer of the entity.
Any single customer [Member]
Top Ten Health Care Distribution Suppliers [Member]
Represents the top ten health care distribution suppliers utilized by the entity.

Single Largest Supplier [Member]
Represents single largest health care distribution supplier utilized by the entity.

Locations Other Than United States [Member]
Total sales and long-lived assets by entities located in countries other than the United States.
Locations other than the United States [Member]
Fair Value Adjustment For Cash Settlement Stock Based Compensation Awards
Fair value adjustment for stock-based compensation awards which can be settled either in cash or shares at the discretion of the award recipient.
Fair value adjustment for cash settlement stock-based compensation awards
Share Based Compensation Arrangement By Share Based Payment Award Options And Other Equity Instruments Grants In Period Weighted Average Grant Date Fair Value

The weighted average grant-date fair value, before forfeitures, of nonvested awards on share-based plans for which the employer is contingently obligated to issue equity instruments to an employee who has not yet satisfied service or performance criteria necessary to gain title to proceeds from the sale of the award or underlying shares.
Weighted-average grant date fair value of stock-based awards granted before forfeitures (in dollars per share)

Maximum percentage of 401(k) plan contributions that can be allocated to the Henry Schein Stock Fund.

Qualified 401K plan [Member]

Plan designed to provide participants with a supplemental benefit for amounts excluded from the 401(k) plan.

Deferred Compensation Bonus And Commission Plan [Member]
A plan which permits a select group of management or highly compensated employees to defer base salary, bonus and commission, if applicable.
Deferred compensation bonus and commission plan [Member]

The maximum interest rate on outstanding capital leases.

Amount of increase effective every fifth year on lifetime consulting agreement.

Consolidated Tax Return Inclusion Threshold Percentage
Percentage of ownership in subsidiaries which is used as a threshold for inclusion in the consolidated tax return filed by the reporting entity.

Business Acquisition Number Of Countries In Which Acquired Businesses Operate
Number of countries in which acquired business operates

Information regarding the acquisition of the physician office-focused commercial organization of Cardinal Health's Medical segment under the terms of a long-term strategic agreement with Cardinal Health, Inc.

Total Noncurrent Deferred Tax Liabilities

Amount of non-current deferred tax liability attributable to taxable temporary differences, net of deferred tax asset attributable to deductible temporary differences. Includes certain deferred tax amounts that do not have a right of offset, which result from applying the applicable tax rate to net taxable temporary differences.
Total non-current deferred tax liability
Total Noncurrent Deferred Tax Liabilities Net Of Valuation Allowance
Net non-current deferred tax liability

Amount of non-current deferred tax liability attributable to taxable temporary differences, net of deferred tax asset attributable to deductible temporary differences and net of valuation allowance. Includes certain deferred tax amounts that do not have a right of offset, which result from applying the applicable tax rate to net taxable temporary differences.
Purchases [Member]
Purchases [Member]
Purchases.
Valuation Allowance Deferred Tax Asset Change In Amount Portion Related To Change In Expectation Of Realization
Valuation allowance, deferred tax asset, reduction in amount
The portion of the increase (decrease) in the valuation allowance related to the conclusion that realization of some portion of the valuation allowance would be realized.
